articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
WASHINGTON, Feb 28 (Reuters) - Anthony Fauci, the top U.S. infectious disease official, said on Sunday he would take the newly approved Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine, as he… [+354 chars]
articles.description: Anthony Fauci, the top U.S. infectious disease official, said on Sunday he would take the newly approved Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine, as he encouraged Americans to accept whatever version was available.
articles.title: Fauci says of Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine: 'I would take it' - Reuters Canada
